name: Trooper 3 - Free Exploration Demo
description:
Try out this free virtual-reality demo for the Oculus Rift. Explore an abandoned graveyard, and test your system's compatibility for Trooper 3's full version.

Important: If you feel ready to fight hordes of monsters in this abandoned graveyard, it is recommended that you try the full version. The full version is available at: http://cmdr2.org/trooper3
